name: arrayLen
description:
Determines the number of elements in an array.
 CF MX: this function can be used on child XML objects.

params.name: array
params.description: An array which to determine length

examples.title: Simple example for arrayLen function
examples.description: Uses the arrayLen function to get the total length of an array

examples.title: Total length of an array using the member function
examples.description: CF11+ Lucee4.5+ Uses the len member function is the same as running arrayLen.
